job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtdorsal health is reshaping healthcare to free million americans from chronic pain and musculoskeletal conditions such as spine pain arthritis workplace injuries and opioid addiction our endtoend clinical care model combines technology with a human touch to provide members with ondemand access to elite specialists empathetic care teams and personalized treatment programs were backed by top silicon valley venture capitalists and founders of the fastestgrowing digital health startupsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtabout the roleltstronggtltpgtltpgtas an early member of our engineering team youll partner closely with a worldclass group of doctors designers operators and founders to build products that deliver radically better clinical outcomes at significantly lower costs youll use your experience and expertise to raise the bar on code quality and take a lead role in setting technical direction youre autonomous and selfdriven but can work effectively in a highly collaborative setting in your first few months you may find yourself working onltpgtltulgtltligtintuitive and engaging virtual care experiences such as video visits live messaging provider matching and appointment schedulingltligtltligtintelligent tooling and electronic health record systems to improve the efficacy of our inhouse clinical staffltligtltligtconnected wearable devices that monitor and reduce workplace injury riskltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhat youll doltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtcollaborate with designers clinicians and other engineers to build new features from start to finish through conception research implementation and maintenanceltligtltligtdrive fullstack product development for care delivery platforms used by both internal providers and external consumersltligtltligthelp set up and iterate on foundational engineering processes including version control continuous integration deployment infrastructure and internal documentationltligtltligtuphold standards for quality by performing code reviews fixing bugs creating automated tests and monitoring performanceltligtltligtgrow the team by onboarding and helping to recruit highly capable engineersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhat you haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years of professional experience developing software for production environmentsltligtltligtstrong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to convey complicated systems to both technical and nontechnical audiencesltligtltligtexperience working across the stack on frontend backend and infrastructure you dont need to be an expert in all of these but it helps to be interested in learning about themltligtltligtproficiency with tools and frameworks for modern web mobile application development our current favorites are typescript react react native nextjs apollo graphql hasura postgresql and terraformltligtltligtexcellent problem solving and debugging skills with the right balance between development velocity and designing for longterm scalabilityltligtltligtbachelors degree in computer science computer engineering or a similar technical fieldltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtbonus points if you haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtexperience designing deploying and managing cloud infrastructureltligtltligta passion for solving ideas or side projects etcltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhat youll gainltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligthighly competitive salary and equity in a fastgrowing startupltligtltligtcomprehensive
